articles.title: Decoding Sachin Bansal Navi's DRHP - Entrackr
articles.description: Sachin Bansal led financial services company Navi Technologies has filed its Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) with market regulator SEBI. The company is looking to raise Rs 3,350 crore via a fresh issue of equity and may consider raising up to Rs 670 crore…
